translations: [电] 螺线管；螺线形电导管

phrs.translation: 螺线管，螺丝管；电磁线圈，螺管线圈

sentences.sentence: One-half of each solenoid loop was replaced with an aluminum card into which tiny vicalloy bar magnets were embedded.
sentences.translation: 每个螺线管回路的一半都换成了铝卡，其中嵌入了细小的维卡合金棒形磁铁。

sentences.sentence: and an increase in decline solenoid valve control;
sentences.translation: 上升与下降电磁阀的控制；

sentences.sentence: The solution is to replace the turbo wastegate solenoid valve.
sentences.translation: 解决方法是更换涡轮废气旁通阀电磁阀。
